content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generation at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) to (x=-0.5, y=5.5)
Consists of:
-   Offshore Pump at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) extracting water.
-   Pipes transporting water from (x=-8.5, y=-0.5) to (x=-7.5, y=2.5).
-   Boiler at (x=-5.5, y=2.0) consuming water and fuel (currently NO_FUEL) to produce steam.
-   Pipes transporting steam from (x=-5.5, y=0.5) to (x=-0.5, y=2.5).
-   Steam Engine at (x=-0.5, y=5.5) consuming steam
